name: The Bird (itch) (fieryaidan)
description:
Disclaimer: Loud Noises and Jumpscares

Contains copyrighted assets and music, planning to change that but if you own any of the material and want me to remove it,  just comment it and I'll check every week.

Anyways, you're gaming and the bird comes to your house. Complete stuff and escape that fever dream of a bird. 

Short horror game made in about a week.

I will update and this an extremely early prototype to test the concept.
